content: **crochet drops shawl and hat with flowers in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see crochet hat pattern here 1 ---------------------- **measurements** approx 54 cm x 135 cm / 21¼ x 53⅛ **materials** drops snow from garnstudio color nr diagram letter 50 gr nr 3 brown a 50 gr nr 20 lilac variegated b 50 gr nr 4 lilac c 50 gr nr 25 grass green d 50 gr nr 5 turquoise e 50 gr nr 6 olive f drops 10 mm / us n crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge gauge one blossom measures approx 9 cm in diameter 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/86-13-b---hat
